name: ♡(Roblox) Purple Grid♡
description: A cute purple grid background with purple details for your roblox page! (In case you don't see the Settings button in the screenshot, don't worry, when you download it's still there!)

discussions.name: Why the heck it gaves you a cursor, I liked it but???, BROOOOOO WHY IT DOENST APPEAR THE BACKGROUND?
